boardgame.name: Malé velké zombie
Pequeños Grandes Zombis
Tiny Epic Zombi vérfürdő
Tiny Epic Zombies
Winzige Wandelnde Leichen
boardgame.description: GENERAL INFO: 1-5 players, 30 minutes, 5 play modes including competitive and cooperative play._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Cooperative team-play with game controlled Zombies._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Cooperative team-play with Zombies controlled by a non-team player._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Competitive free-for-all with game controlled Zombies._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Competitive free-for-all with Zombies controlled by a player._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Solo._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;THEME: Modern day Zombie outbreak at the Echo Ridge Mall._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;HOOK: Fast paced, portable, and tons of replayability. Play as the survivors or the Zombies. Plus ITEMeeples!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;WIN: Survivors must complete 3 objectives - Zombies must kill all the Survivors or gain control of the Mall's Courtyard._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;OVERVIEW: In Tiny Epic Zombies, survivors are always on the run, collecting weapons, killing Zombies and working toward completing objectives. Completing 3 objectives can win you the game but if you're too focused on the objectives, the Zombies will overrun the mall and that will be the end of you._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Based on the mode of play, you will either play as one of the Survivors or as the Zombies._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As a Survivor, your turn will consist of moving 3 times. Then based on where you move, you'll be able to do additional things. For instance, if you move into a room with a Zombie, you'll have to fight it by rolling the Zombie die. Or if you move into a room adjacent to a Zombie, you can spend ammo to shoot it. Killing a Zombie is actually pretty easy... but they just keep coming. Keeping them from overrunning the entire mall, while trying to accomplish your objectives, that is hard!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;After you've taken your 3 moves, you'll search the room. This is done by revealing the Search Card you are holding. Most of the time, you find something useful, like awesome items you can later pickup and equip to your ITEMeeples. Sometimes though, you may find a Zombie lurking in the corner. So be prepared._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;After you search the room, more Zombies flood into the Mall. Then it's the next player's turn. Simple as that._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Note: If your ammo and wound tokens ever meet, you're dead meat! So, keep your wounds low and your ammo high._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;If you die, that character will turn into a Zombie and you'll have to draw a new character to play. If that happens too many times, you lose the game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As a Zombie player, not only will you control unique Zombies with special abilities, you will control ALL the Zombies! With your help, the Zombies will have a brain in addition to eating brains. Your game will be to overwhelm the players with clever placement and movement of the Zombies. Smother them with your Zombie horde and prevent them from completing their objectives. If you kill enough players or overrun the mall courtyard, you win._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: Devon Dice Unhinged 4. He’s back... Lewis is not dead!
Episode 27 - Dead of Winter vs Zombicide Green Horde vs Tiny Epic Zombies
Episode 83 - Scott Almes is Rescued From Neverland

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Tiny Epic Zombies - Deluxe Edition Full Kickstarter Versions - includes all stretch goals and Kickstarter Limited Exclusive Deluxe Content Shipping is $6 USD
Brand new deluxe Kickstarter Edition. Still in shrink, I was taken over by Kickstarter madness. :-) I did not purchase a neoprene mat, though. Shipping $8 any where in US. Paypal only. Enjoy!

Got the double pledge version but my partner backed out, so I got one brand new, still in shrink-wrap, Deluxe kickstarter game left. Hatte den Doppel-Pledge gebacken und dann ist mein Mitbacker abgesprungen, sodass ich jetzt noch ein original-verschweißtes Spiel der Deluxe-Kickstarter-Version übrig habe. Versicherter Versand mit Hermes für 3,89€ Zahlung per PayPal oder Überweisung möglich.
